山.definition: mountain; hill (CL:座[zuo4]); (coll.) small bundle of straw for silkworms to spin cocoons on

山不轉水轉.definition: it's a small world; only mountains never meet

山不轉路轉.definition: see 山不轉水轉|山不转水转[shan1 bu4 zhuan4 shui3 zhuan4]

山中無老虎，猴子稱大王.pinyin: shan1 zhong1 wu2 lao3 hu3 , hou2 zi5 cheng1 da4 wang2
山中無老虎，猴子稱大王.definition: in the country of the blind the one-eyed man is king (idiom); (depending on the source, the last word is either 大王[da4 wang2] or 大王[dai4 wang5])

山丹縣.definition: Shandan county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu

山亭區.definition: Shanting district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong

山勢.definition: topography of a mountain; features of a mountain

山南市.definition: Lhoka, prefecture-level city in Tibet Autonomous Region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区[Xi1zang4 Zi4zhi4qu1]

山口縣.definition: Yamaguchi prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

山噪鶥.definition: (bird species of China) plain laughingthrush (Pterorhinus davidi)

山地.definition: mountainous region; hilly area; hilly country

山城.definition: Shancheng district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan

山城區.definition: Shancheng district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan

山外有山，天外有天.pinyin: shan1 wai4 you3 shan1 , tian1 wai4 you3 tian1
山外有山，天外有天.definition: (idiom) however good sth is, there is always sth better; in the wider world there are people more talented than oneself

山奈.definition: (loanword) cyanide; Kaempferia galanga (variant of 山柰[shan1nai4])

山寨.definition: fortified hill village; mountain stronghold (esp. of bandits); (fig.) knockoff (goods); counterfeit; imitation

山寨貨.definition: a fake; imitation or counterfeit product

山嵛菜.definition: variant of 山萮菜[shan1 yu2 cai4]

山巒.definition: mountain range; unbroken chain of peaks

山形.definition: Yamagata prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

山形縣.definition: Yamagata prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

山斑鳩.definition: (bird species of China) oriental turtle dove (Streptopelia orientalis)

山明水秀.definition: lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom); fig. enchanting scenery

山本頭.definition: (Tw) "Yamamoto haircut", similar to a butch cut, but with even length (no tapering on the sides and back), said to be named after Admiral Yamamoto 山本五十六[Shan1 ben3 Wu3 shi2 liu4]

山東.definition: see 山東省|山东省[Shan1dong1 Sheng3]

山東省.definition: Shandong Province, capital Jinan 濟南市|济南市[Ji3nan2 Shi4] (abbr. to 魯|鲁[Lu3])

山東科技大學.pinyin: Shan1 dong1 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2
山東科技大學.definition: Shandong University of Science and Technology

山柰.definition: Kaempferia galanga, one of four plants known as galangal

山梨醇.definition: sorbitol C6H14O6 (sugar substitute and mild laxative)

山楂糕.definition: haw jelly, a sweet jelly popular in northern China, made from Chinese hawthorn fruit

山水.definition: water from a mountain; mountains and rivers; scenery; landscape

山水詩.definition: shanshui poetry, genre of Classical Chinese poetry

山河.definition: mountains and rivers; the whole country

山河鎮.definition: Shanhe town in Zhengning county 正寧縣|正宁县[Zheng4 ning2 xian4], Qingyang 慶陽|庆阳[Qing4 yang2], Gansu

山洪.definition: deluge caused by torrential water flow off a mountain after heavy rain or snowmelt

山海經.definition: Classic of Mountain and Sea, probably compiled c. 500 BC-200 BC, contains wide range of geography, mythology, witchcraft, popular customs etc

山海關.definition: Shanhai Pass in Hebei, at the eastern terminus of the Ming dynasty Great Wall; Shanhaiguan district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei

山海關區.definition: Shanhaiguan district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei

山清水秀.definition: lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom); fig. enchanting scenery

山珍海味.definition: exotic delicacies; luxury foodstuff from distant locations

山珍海錯.definition: rarities from the mountain and the sea (idiom); fig. a sumptuous spread of food delicacies

山皇鳩.definition: (bird species of China) mountain imperial pigeon (Ducula badia)

山盟海誓.definition: to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love; to swear by all the Gods

山窮水盡.definition: mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line; nowhere to go

山精.definition: mountain spirit; monster or creature said to inhabit mountains

山羊座.definition: Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac); Japanese variant of 魔羯座

山胞.definition: (dated) Taiwanese indigenous peoples; Taiwanese aborigine; abbr. for 山地同胞[shan1 di4 tong2 bao1]

山腰.definition: the place halfway up a mountain

山莊.definition: manor house; villa; (used in hotel names)

山藍仙鶲.definition: (bird species of China) hill blue flycatcher (Cyornis whitei)

山西省.definition: Shanxi Province, capital Taiyuan 太原市[Tai4yuan2 Shi4] (abbr. to 晉|晋[Jin4])

山陰.definition: Shanyin county in Shuozhou 朔州[Shuo4 zhou1], Shanxi

山陰縣.definition: Shanyin county in Shuozhou 朔州[Shuo4 zhou1], Shanxi

山陽.definition: Shanyang District of Jiaozuo City 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 Shi4], Henan; Shanyang County in Shangluo 商洛[Shang1 luo4], Shaanxi

山陽區.definition: Shanyang District of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan

山陽縣.definition: Shanyang County in Shangluo 商洛[Shang1 luo4], Shaanxi

山青水靈.definition: lit. green mountains and vivacious waters (idiom); fig. lush and lively scenery

山靛.definition: (botany) the spurges, the mercuries (plants of genus Mercurialis)

山頹木壞.definition: lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined; a great sage has died (idiom)

山高水長.definition: high as the mountain and long as the river (idiom); fig. noble and far-reaching

山高水險.definition: lit. the mountains are high and the torrents swift; to undertake an arduous task or journey (idiom)

山高海深.definition: high as the mountain and deep as the sea (idiom); fig. infinite bounty

山鶥.definition: (bird species of China) Beijing babbler; Chinese hill warbler (Rhopophilus pekinensis)

山鶺鴒.definition: (bird species of China) forest wagtail (Dendronanthus indicus)

山鷚.definition: (bird species of China) upland pipit (Anthus sylvanus)

山鷦鶯.definition: (bird species of China) striped prinia (Prinia striata)

山麻雀.definition: (bird species of China) russet sparrow (Passer cinnamomeus)
